Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Description: location to display the help page. If the Target is a Task Pane widget name, help will be displayed there, otherwise if it is a page DOM element, it will display in that element, otherwise it will open a popup window with the target name.
Parameter.Label: Target

Parameter.Name: Url
Parameter.Description: The URL which contaions the help page contents.
Parameter.Label: Help URL
